00016 #ifndef TIMER_HPP
00017 #define TIMER_HPP
00018 
00019 #include <sys/timeb.h>
00020 #include <time.h>
00021 
00026 #define TIMEB timeb
00027 #define FTIME ftime
00028 
00035 class Timer
00036 {
00037 public:
00038 
00039   Timer()
00040     :intervalRunning(false)
00041   {}
00042 
00049   double initialize(double startTime=0.0)
00050   {
00051     this->offset = startTime;
00052 
00053     FTIME(&t);
00054     t0 = (double)(t.time + t.millitm/1000.0);
00055     return t0;
00056   }
00057 
00064   double elapsedTime()
00065   {
00066     currentTime();
00067     return(t2-t0 + offset);
00068   }
00069 
00074   void resetInterval()
00075   {
00076     intervalRunning = true;
00077     FTIME(&t);
00078     t1 = (double)(t.time + t.millitm/1000.0);
00079   }
00080 
00087   double intervalDelay()
00088   {
00089     if(intervalRunning == false)
00090     {
00091       return 0;
00092     }
00093     FTIME(&t);
00094     t2 = (double)(t.time + t.millitm/1000.0);
00095     return t2-t1;
00096   }
00097 
00098 private:
00099 
00100   // Offset that will be added at current delta time from start instant.
00101   double offset;
00102   struct TIMEB t;
00103   double t0, t1, t2;
00104   bool intervalRunning;
00105 
00106   // return The elapsed time since 00:00:00 UTC, in seconds.
00107   double currentTime()
00108   {
00109     FTIME(&t);
00110     t2 = (double)(t.time + t.millitm/1000.0);
00111     return t2;
00112   }
00113 
00114 };

00117 #endif
